base_description: Tall, rectangular, gray wardrobe with sleek design.
part_description: Two vertical doors with handles, three horizontal divisions on the right door. Doors are centered and symmetrical.
internal_interaction_description: The two doors open outward, revealing storage space divided by shelves. The right door features three horizontal panels, possibly indicating separate compartments or drawers inside.
external_interaction_description: The wardrobe is designed to stand against a wall, providing storage for clothing and personal items. It interacts with users by offering easy access through its doors and handles, and can be part of bedroom or closet furniture arrangements.
